outputName.description:
Special flag that specify the output filename (relative from input file directory)
Used only as [37m[40mnew=filename[49m[39m or [37m[40m--new=filename[49m[39m. can leave empty to disable (not in setup)

raw.description: Convert github images to raw version (if needed)

expand.description: Adds an icon to start collapsible content description (after [37m[40m<summary>[49m[39m)

codeblock.description:
Replace:
[37m[40m```languageName[49m[39m
[37m[40mcodeblock lines[49m[39m
[37m[40m```â€Ž[49m[39m
With:
[37m[40m{% highlight languageName %}[49m[39m
[37m[40mcodeblock lines[49m[39m
[37m[40m{% endhighlight %}[49m[39m
